A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining movie\, just like the last one\, but I didn't wait all of this time to see the return of the beloved characters from the original trilogy just to see Disney kill them off one by one. New characters are great\, and obviously necessary to keep a franchise going\, but not at the expense of the last\, and certainly not just so a one-shot director can put their mark on the franchise using cheap and convenient devices and tropes.
